verses.verse: Israel, <S%H3478><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> for you have fallen <S%H3782><s%> because of your sin. <S%H5771><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> with you, <S%H7725><s%> and return to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Tell <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H5375><s%> "Forgive all our sins, <S%H5771><s%> and accept <S%H3947><s%> that which is good: <S%H2896><s%> so we offer <S%H7999><s%> our lips <S%H8193><s%> like bulls. <S%H6499><s%>

Assyria <S%H804><s%> can't <S%H3467><s%> save us. <S%H7392><s%> We won't ride on horses; <S%H5483><s%> neither will we say <S%H559><s%> any more to the work <S%H4639><s%> of our hands, <S%H3027><s%> <S%H430><s%> 'Our gods!' for in you the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> finds mercy. <S%H7355><s%>"
"I will heal <S%H7495><s%> their waywardness. <S%H4878><s%> I will love <S%H157><s%> them freely; <S%H5071><s%> for my anger <S%H639><s%> is turned away from him. <S%H7725><s%>

I will be like the dew <S%H2919><s%> to Israel. <S%H3478><s%> He will blossom <S%H6524><s%> like the lily, <S%H7799><s%> and send down <S%H5221><s%> his roots <S%H8328><s%> like Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>
His branches <S%H3127><s%> will spread, <S%H3212><s%> and his beauty <S%H1935><s%> will be like the olive tree, <S%H2132><s%> and his fragrance <S%H7381><s%> like Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>

Men will live <S%H3427><s%> in his shade. <S%H6738><s%> <S%H7725><s%> They will revive <S%H2421><s%> like the grain, <S%H1715><s%> and blossom <S%H6524><s%> like the vine. <S%H1612><s%> Their fragrance <S%H2143><s%> will be like the wine <S%H3196><s%> of Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>

Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> what have I to do any more with idols? <S%H6091><s%> I answer, <S%H6030><s%> and will take care <S%H7789><s%> of him. <S%H7488><s%> I am like a green fir tree; <S%H1265><s%> from me your fruit <S%H6529><s%> is found. <S%H4672><s%>"

Who is wise, <S%H2450><s%> that he may understand <S%H995><s%> these things? <S%H995><s%> Who is prudent, that he may know <S%H3045><s%> them? <S%H1870><s%> For the ways of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> are right, <S%H3477><s%> and the righteous <S%H6662><s%> walk <S%H3212><s%> in them; <S%H6586><s%> But the rebellious stumble in them. <S%H3782><s%>
